parameter.name: ApplicationServices-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: ApplicationServices Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: data source=ICSR-HALL;initial catalog=webAdmin1; user id=sa; password=sa@123

parameter.name: Recruit-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: Recruit Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: data source=ICSR-HALL;initial catalog=Recruit; user id=sa; password=sa@123;

parameter.name: RecruitEntities-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: RecruitEntities Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: metadata=res://*/Models.Recruitment.csdl|res://*/Models.Recruitment.ssdl|res://*/Models.Recruitment.msl;provider=System.Data.SqlClient;provider connection string="data source=ICSR-HALL;initial catalog=Recruit;persist security info=True;user id=sa;password=sa@123;MultipleActiveResultSets=True;App=EntityFramework"
